post.summary: Update account subscription
post.description:
Update account subscription - Recurly account may be updated
  • accountId is required. Only account admin/lead has access to this API
  • All other parameters are optional.
  • If (overage) is sent, account overage field is updated, otherwise, overage field is not changed
  • If (accountPlanFlavorId) is sent, updatability is checked. If allowed, the attributes in the Account Plan Flavor is used to update account subscription

post.summary: List All Jobs of the Account Page by Page
post.description:
List All Jobs of the Account Page by Page
  • accountId is required, Only account admins can do this
  • To Improve Performance, set includeJobStatus = false
  • pageNumber - the page number the API call will return, 0 means the first page will be returned
  • pageSize: - the maximum number of the Jobs a page will return
  • includeFinished - if true, a list of jobs in FINISHED status is included in the response, the list is limited to the pageSize
  • includeQueued - if true, the list of ALL jobs in QUEUED status is included in the response
  • includeCreated - if true, the list of ALL jobs in CREATED status is included in the response
  • includeJobStatus - if true, Job Status List is included in the Jobs
  • startDate - The beginning search Date, if null, start from the very beginning
  • endDate - The ending search Date, if null, end from now
  • includeChildrenJobs - if true, children Jobs is included in the search results
  • projectJobOnly - if true, only Jobs which have projectId is included in the serach results
  • noProjectJobOnly - if ture, only jobs without projectId is included in the search results
  • jobStatus - if the value is defined, only the jobs with this Status is included in the search results
  • includeCombined - if true, a list of jobs in all statuses is included in the response, the list is limited to the pageSize
  • Only one of the includeFinished and includeCombined could be true
  • jobStatus must be one of the following values: FINISHED, CREATED, QUEUED, PAUSED, COMPLETED, CANCELLED, FAILED
  • Response:
  • pageCount - the total number of pages in the search
  • jobCount - the total number of jobs in the search
  • hasMoreJobs - if false, the search is completed, no more jobs are available, otherwise, the search is not completed, more jobs are available
  • jobListFinished - the list of jobs in FINISHED status
  • jobListQueued - the list of jobs in QUEUED status
  • jobListCreated - the list of jobs in CREATED status

post.summary: Update Account Subscription
post.description:
Update account subscription by OnScale Admin - Recurly account may be updated
  • For Plan Upgrade, the subscription update is applied immediately
  • For Plan downgrade or other changes, the subscription always happen at the end of a billing period
  • To Apply Plan downgrade immediately, please cancel the subscription of the account first by API account/subscription/cancel.
  • accountId is required. Only OnScale admin has access to this API
  • All other parameters are optional.
  • If an parameter is sent, the associated attribute in the account subscription is updated, otherwise, no change to it
  • Empty lists of (applications) and (solvers) will remove the existing applications and solvers from the account.
  • Allowed values for (applications) are: beamtool, integration_test, onscale-cli, onscale-lab, onscale-python, onscale-solve
  • Allowed values for (solvers) are: FLEX, REFLEX, MOEBIUS

post.summary: Submit job with the details necessary to allow job to run.
post.description:
Submit job with the details necessary to allow job to run
  • Returns the Job Object with newly created simulationIds
  • This API can only be called once for each Job
  • The following Parameters are required:
  • jobId
  • accountId
  • coreHourEstimate
  • numberOfParts
  • dockerTag
  • jobName
  • mainFile
  • simulations
  • precision
  • operation
  • coresRequired
  • ramEstimate
  • maxSpendCH
  • The following Permissions are checked:
  • The User has access to the Job
  • The User and Account have enough available Core Hour to run the simulations
  • The Account has access to the HPC
  • The following Validations are checked:
  • Job has been initialized and jobId is in the database
  • Number of Simulation should be less than 4000
  • For MNMPI operation, ramEstimate should be less than 8000
  • For MNMPI operation, preprocessor should not be MODELWRITER
  • File Dependency Validation
  • File Alias Validation

post.summary: Submit a jobId and a paused simulationId of the job to rerun the job simulation
post.description:
Submit a jobId and a paused simulationId of the job to rerun the job simulation
  • Only paused simulation is allowed to restart
  • OnScale Jobs and Simulations are immutable, the Simulations could not be Rerun
  • This API does the following
  • Init a new Job based on the jobId, the new Job's parentJobId is set to be the jobId
  • The new Parameters: timeToEnd, newRamEstimate, restartFile are used to replaced the same attributes in the old Job
  • Clone a new Simulation based the existing Simulation
  • Set the parentSimulationId of the new Simulation to be the simulationId
  • Submit the new Job to run

post.summary: Load lists of your jobs by page
post.description:
Load lists of your jobs by page
  • To Improve Performance and use all options, set includeJobStatus = false
  • Request Parameters
  • accountId is required, User's account access is required
  • pageNumber - the page number the API call will return, 0 means the first page will be returned
  • pageSize: - the maximum number of the Jobs a page will return
  • includeCreated - if true, the list of ALL jobs in CREATED status is included in the response
  • includeQueued - if true, the list of ALL jobs in QUEUED status is included in the response
  • includeFinished - if true, a list of jobs in FINISHED status is included in the response, the list is limited to the pageSize
  • includeChildrenAccount - if true, the jobs in the children accounts are included
  • projectId - if set, only Jobs with the projectId match are included
  • designId - if set, only Jobs with the designId match are included
  • designInstanceId - if set, only Jobs with the designInstanceId match are included
  • includeJobStatus - if true, Job Status List is included in the Jobs
  • startDate - The beginning search Date, if null, start from the very beginning
  • endDate - The ending search Date, if null, end from now
  • includeChildrenJobs - if true, children Jobs is included in the search results
  • projectJobOnly - if true, only Jobs which have projectId is included in the serach results
  • noProjectJobOnly - if ture, only jobs without projectId is included in the search results
  • jobStatus - if the value is defined, only the jobs with this Status is included in the search results
  • includeCombined - if true, a list of jobs in all statuses is included in the response, the list is limited to the pageSize
  • Only one of the includeFinished and includeCombined could be true
  • jobStatus must be one of the following values: FINISHED, CREATED, QUEUED, PAUSED, COMPLETED, CANCELLED, FAILED
  • Response:
  • pageCount - the total number of pages in the search
  • jobCount - the total number of jobs in the search
  • hasMoreJobs - if false, the search is completed, no more jobs are available, otherwise, the search is not completed, more jobs are available
  • jobListFinished - the list of jobs in FINISHED status
  • jobListQueued - the list of jobs in QUEUED status
  • jobListCreated - the list of jobs in CREATED status

post.summary: Search Simulations of the Job, and return Simulation List by page, along with summary data
post.description:
Search Simulations of the Job, and return Simulation List by page, along with summary data
  • Request Parameters
  • jobId - required, User's access to the Job is required
  • pageNumber - required, the number of page to return, 0 means the first page
  • pageSize - required, the size of the page, maximum number of Simulations returned
  • sortBy - the name of the Simulation consoleParameters, the list will be sorted by the value of this parameter
  • descendingSort - if true, List will be sorted descendingly
  • filterByStatus - if null, Simulation Status is not checked, otherwise, only the Simulation Status matched are returned
  • filters - A list of Filters of Simulation consoleParameters
    - filterBy: name of consoleParameters
    - minValue: minimal value of the simulation consoleParameter
    - maxValue: maximum value of the simulation consoleParameter
    - textMatch: value of the simulation consoleParameter to match
  • Response
  • pageCount - total number of pages of the search results
  • request - the request the API received
  • statusSummary - a Mapping of Simulation Status and the number of Simulations in the Status
  • simulations - the list of Simulations, only current page matching the pageNumber is returned
  • descendantSimulationMap - a Mapping of simulationId and the list of their descendant Simulations which are the simulations cloned from the simulation

post.summary: Add a Notification and deliver the Notification if immediatelyDelivery is true
post.description:
Add a Notification and Deliver the Notification if immediatelyDelivery is true
  • Request Parameters:
  • objectTyp - required, must be one of the following values: SYSTEM, ACCOUNT, USER, PROJECT, DESIGN, DESIGNINSTANCE
  • objectId - required except SYSTEM objectType, accessibility of Object is required, Only OnScale Marketing could use SYSTEM objectType
  • content - the notification content
  • invitedUserIds - the list of users the notification may apply to
  • immediateDelivery - if true, WebSocket messages will be sent to the notification receivers
  • startDate - Notification effective Start date
  • endDate - Notification Effective End Date
  • Notification Receivers:
  • objectTyp = SYSTEM, all Users in the System
  • objectTyp = ACCOUNT, all users in the account + users in the invitedUserIds
  • objectType = USER, users in the invitedUserIds
  • objectType = PROJECT, DESIGN, or DESIGNINSTANCE, all contributors of the project + users in the invitedUserIds
  • Immediately Delivery when immediateDelivery is true:
  • objectTyp = SYSTEM, Notification with hash is returned, Second Step validation call is required by API admin/notification/broadcast/execute before broadcast the Websocket message to all Users in the System
  • objectTyp = ACCOUNT, USER, PROJECT, DESIGN, or DESIGNINSTANCE, WebSocket Messages are sent to all receivers
